thread.title: A Regal-Looking Eli Stars As Latest Alter "Love Live! School Idol Festival" Figure
thread.title_full: A Regal-Looking Eli Stars As Latest Alter "Love Live! School Idol Festival" Figure

author: news+feed@crunchyroll.com
title: A Regal-Looking Eli Stars As Latest Alter "Love Live! School Idol Festival" Figure
text:
Eli Ayase flashes those Russian-blue eyes in the latest Alter figure inspired by  Love Live! 's School Idol Festival smartphone game. This September release is based on the sculpt by Takafumi Tobita with painting by Ichiro Ayabe. Preorders are being offered now for 19,224yen. 
 


 

  
Scott Green is editor and reporter for anime and manga at geek entertainment site  Ain't It Cool News . Follow him on Twitter at  @aicnanime .
